name: Biston
tagline: Calliope-class sentiment parser with built-in usefulness metrics
body:
### Welcome to Biston.
Biston is the third iteration in the Calliope Sentiment Parser Series (CSPS). It is open-source and freely available for use and contributions. This page is still in the early stages, but please stick around and see what we develop over the next months!

## Contributors
This project is the work of Brigham Young University, done as coursework for the Natural Language Processing course (LING581). You can contact us at thyer@byu.edu or through GitHub.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
